alert.note: Alert for Coastal Palm Beach County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Statement issued October 31 at 3:10PM EDT until November 01 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...HIGH RIP CURRENT RISK IN EFFECT THROUGH TUESDAY EVENING FOR COASTAL PALM BEACH... ...COASTAL FLOOD STATEMENT REMAINS IN EFFECT THROUGH TUESDAY EVENING FOR COASTAL PALM BEACH... * WHAT...For the High Rip Current Risk, dangerous rip currents. For the Coastal Flood Statement, isolated minor coastal flooding. * WHERE...Coastal Palm Beach County. * WHEN...Through Tuesday evening. * IMPACTS...Some water on low lying roads and property. Rip currents can sweep even the best swimmers away from shore into deeper water.
info.instruction: Do not drive through flooded roadways. Swim near a lifeguard. If caught in a rip current, relax and float. Don`t swim against the current. If able, swim in a direction following the shoreline. If unable to escape, face the shore and call or wave for help.
